title: Slack has raised our charges by $195k per year
author: JustSkyfall
aiHeadline: Slack just raised its prices by $195k a year, proving that even digital communication can't escape the inflation train.

title: Nvidia buys $5B in Intel
author: stycznik
aiHeadline: Nvidia spends $5 billion on Intel stock, because who needs actual innovation when you can just buy your way into the market?

title: KDE is now my favorite desktop
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: After years of suffering through other desktops, one user finally finds KDE to be the most user-friendly, proving that sometimes, the best things in life are worth the learning curve.

title: Show HN: The text disappears when you screenshot it
author: zikero
aiHeadline: A new tool makes your text disappear when you screenshot it, because who needs evidence when you can just have a good laugh?

title: CERN Animal Shelter for Computer Mice (2011)
author: EbNar
aiHeadline: CERN, the organization that brought you the internet, now runs an animal shelter for computer mice, proving that even scientists need a break from particle physics.
